entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind light except east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
